about_the_game:
Separated by Nightmares: The Last Stand is a unique horror experience. While it shares elements with other first-person puzzle horror games, its story-driven approach stands out. What starts as a simple journey quickly becomes something far darker. Relaxing yet terrifying, beautiful yet disturbing—this game lingers long after the credits roll. Venture into a dark, mysterious forest where malevolent spirits and unsettling mysteries keep you on edge as you uncover the truth behind the nightmare.

Story



From the fantasy author of The Swords of Unforgotten Memories and Worlds Beneath the Shadows comes the first chapter in a gripping story-driven horror game series, which centres on a woman seeking escape from her grief.

She retreats to a secluded forest, but dark spirits lurk in the shadows with unknown intentions. To survive, she must confront her grief and unravel the mystery behind these entities in this chilling, story-driven horror experience.

In this narrative horror game, survival means facing both external horrors and her own buried emotions.

Key Features



  • Story-Driven Horror: Immerse yourself in a deeply narrative experience where every element is woven into the chilling tale of grief and survival, set in a forest where lost souls linger, bound by tasks never completed
  • First-Person Perspective: Experience the terror up close as you navigate the eerie forest through the protagonist's eyes, where lost souls remain trapped by unfinished business.
  • Mystery and Discovery: Unravel the secrets behind the haunting entities, uncovering their motives as you progress through the game.
  • Emotional Depth: A narrative that delves into themes of loss, grief, and the human psyche, offering more than just surface-level scares.
  • Atmospheric Setting: Venture into a secluded forest shrouded in darkness, where malevolent spirits and haunting mysteries await at every turn, creating an atmosphere that keeps you constantly on edge.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains disturbing imagery, references to drugs and alcohol, strong language, themes of grief and loss, violence.

short_description: In this first-person, story-driven horror game, a grieving woman retreats to a secluded forest seeking peace. Instead, she faces dark spirits with unknown motives. To survive, she must unravel the mystery behind the haunting entities while confronting the inner demons of her own grief.
